::Ramulus/Firearm/Proto/Smokescreen/Slayer::

Ramulus frowns at Lunarpine's question, looking down at the anti-chip weapon 
he was carrying. "If they were reprogrammed, you mean?"

He sighs. "Then this weapon will be useless."

Ramulus looks up at the sky. Firearm and Proto were flying high overhead, 
cloaked. Smokescreen was scouting ahead on foot, also cloaked. Somewhere in 
the area, Brix, Fliq, and Snow Cat were also making their way to the meeting 
place, hopefully also cloaked. That made 8 bots, all out to rescue Striker 
and Spears.

"Then we'll need to get them and programm them back to Maximal, I guess."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Cloaked on his cliff, Slayer scans the area, searching for any Maximals. 
Catching a glimpse of Ramulus in the distance, Slayer's face twists into an 
evil smile.

"They are on their way, Master," he says into his comm-link, watching Ramulus 
carefully.
